sentences.en: During the acts Carrie found herself listening to him very attentively.
sentences.cn: 看戏的时候,嘉莉发现自己在很专心地听他说话.

sentences.en: He listened attentively to my brief rehearsal of the structure of parts.
sentences.cn: 他专心地听着我描述各部分的结构.

sentences.en: He questioned Chrissie, and listened attentively to what she told him.
sentences.cn: 他询问了克里茜，并仔细聆听她所说的话。

sentences.en: He was attentively solicitous to her after her running away.
sentences.cn: 自从她出走以来,他对待她变得殷勤周到了.

sentences.en: He was writing his report so attentively that he didn't know the rice gruel in the pot had boiled over.
sentences.cn: 他聚精会神地写报告,连锅里的稀饭煮溢了也不知道.

sentences.en: It is worthwhile to consider this view more attentively.
sentences.cn: 这样的观点,我们应该更加用心地来考虑.

sentences.en: Listen attentively ; don't break in so often.
sentences.cn: 注意听, 别老是插嘴.

sentences.en: Ralph had listened attentively to this judicious report.
sentences.cn: 拉尔夫对这个有见识的报告听得津津有味.

sentences.en: She encouraged her men to talk, and she always listened attentively.
sentences.cn: 她鼓励伙计们随意闲聊, 她听着也不觉厌烦.

sentences.en: She listened attentively and set down every word he said.
sentences.cn: 她专心听着,把他说的话一字不漏地记下来.

sentences.en: She listened attentively while I poured out my problems.
sentences.cn: 我倾吐心中的烦恼时,她一直在注意听.

sentences.en: The tall, gracious young woman listened attentively to these contrite words.
sentences.cn: 身材修长, 气度高雅的少妇静听着这些带着悔意的言语.

sentences.en: The tone of his voice is so arresting that everyone listened attentively.
sentences.cn: 他的语调十分引人注意，大家都聚精会神地听着。

sentences.en: We listened attentively to the report.
sentences.cn: 我们仔细地听了这个报告.

sentences.en: Wu Sun - fu listened attentively, while his eyes scanned Tu Weiyueh's imperturbable face.
sentences.cn: 吴荪甫很注意地听着, 眼光在屠维岳那冷静的脸上打圈子.

words.tran_cn: 注意地；聚精会神地；周到地

trans.tran_cn: 聚精会神地，周到地，谛，凝神
